name: 陳俊豪
objective:
本課程將介紹軟性計算的概念、特性與優點，旨在提供學生多種不同的技術解決相關問題。課程目標有二：(1) 相關軟性計算技術，包含：關聯分析、群聚分析、分類等；(2)相關軟性計算技術應用，包含：時間序列分析、M-V Model、商業資料分析與組合管理等。
In this course, concepts, properties advantages of soft computing are introduced for providing various ways for students to solve problems. The goals of this course include two parts: (1) related soft computing techniques, including association analysis, clustering, classification, etc; (2) related soft computing applications, including time series analysis, mean-variance model, business data analysis and portfolio management, etc.
schedule:
Week 1:　　Soft Computing Overview
Week 2:　　Soft Computing Technique - Introduction to Association Analysis
Week 3:　　Soft Computing Technique - Advanced Association Analysis
Week 4:　　Soft Computing Technique - Introduction to Clustering Analysis
Week 5:　　Soft Computing Technique - Advanced Clustering Analysis 
Week 6:　　Soft Computing Technique - Introduction to Classification
Week 7:　　Soft Computing Technique - Introduction to Genetic Algorithms
Week 8:　　Soft Computing Technique - Advanced Genetic Algorithms
Week 9:　　Midterm Examination
Week 10:　　Time Series Data Analysis - I (Dimension Reduction)
Week 11:　　Time Series Data Analysis - II (Association Analysis)
Week 12:　　Portfolio Management - I (M-V Model and its Optimization)
Week 13:　　Portfolio Management - II (Group Stock Portfolio Optimization)
Week 14:　　Case Discussion & Paper Study
Week 15:　　Case Discussion & Paper Study
Week 16:　　Case Discussion & Paper Study
Week 17:　　Final Project Presentation
Week 18:　　Final Examination
